meta.description: Character Expression Templates - 22 exaggerated cartoon facial expressions per character
meta.design_note: All expressions are EXTREMELY exaggerated cartoon-style for maximum visibility and emotional clarity

happy.name: Happy Smile
happy.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY happy beaming expression, huge wide cartoon smile showing joy, very bright sparkling {eye_color} eyes with highlight reflections, radiating happiness, rosy cheeks glowing, over-the-top cheerful mood, {base_style}, bright cheerful lighting, clean background, {quality}

excited.name: Super Excited
excited.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, SUPER excited overjoyed expression, extremely wide sparkling starry {eye_color} eyes with star highlights, very wide open mouth shouting with excitement, maximum energy bursting enthusiasm, cartoon-style exaggerated thrill, trembling with excitement, sparkle effects around face, {base_style}, dynamic bright lighting, clean background, {quality}
excited.game_usage: Level up, special rewards, new unlocks

surprised.name: Shocked Surprise
surprised.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY shocked surprised expression, hugely wide circular {eye_color} eyes popping out cartoon-style, eyebrows raised very high, jaw dropped wide open mouth, completely astonished reaction, sweat drop effect, exclamation mark effect nearby, over-the-top dramatic shock, {base_style}, dramatic lighting, clean background, {quality}

confident.name: Super Confident
confident.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, SUPER confident heroic expression, bold proud smirk grin, intensely determined shining {eye_color} eyes with fire of determination, chin up proud pose, dramatic hero angle, gleaming highlight on face, ready for anything attitude, extremely self-assured, {base_style}, epic heroic lighting with lens flare, clean background, {quality}

focused.name: Laser Focused
focused.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, INTENSELY focused laser concentration expression, very narrowed sharp {eye_color} eyes staring intently, furrowed brow showing deep thought, tight determined mouth, sweat drop from concentration, thinking hard visual effect, extremely serious problem-solving mode, {base_style}, dramatic focused lighting, clean background, {quality}

friendly.name: Super Friendly
friendly.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, face and upper body portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY friendly welcoming expression, huge warm inviting smile, very bright sparkling {eye_color} eyes full of warmth, one hand raised high waving enthusiastically, heart symbol effect nearby, radiating warmth and kindness, over-the-top approachable friendly, {base_style}, warm inviting lighting, clean background, {quality}

angry.name: Very Angry
angry.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, VERY angry frustrated expression, intensely furrowed angry eyebrows, sharp narrowed {eye_color} eyes showing displeasure, gritted teeth, steam coming from head cartoon-style, red angry face glow, vein popping effect, extremely upset but still cute, {base_style}, dramatic red tinted lighting, clean background, {quality}

sad.name: Very Sad
sad.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, VERY sad disappointed expression, large watery teary {eye_color} eyes about to cry, downturned mouth pouting, droopy eyebrows showing sadness, single tear drop rolling down, extremely dejected look, cartoon-style exaggerated sadness, blue mood aura, {base_style}, soft melancholic lighting, clean background, {quality}

worried.name: Very Worried
worried.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY worried anxious expression, wide nervous {eye_color} eyes darting around, heavily furrowed brow with worry lines, biting lip nervously, multiple sweat drops cartoon-style, trembling slightly, question marks floating around head, over-the-top anxiety visible, {base_style}, tense nervous lighting, clean background, {quality}

confused.name: Very Confused
confused.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY confused puzzled expression, one {eye_color} eye squinting the other wide open, eyebrows in asymmetric confused position, mouth twisted in bewilderment, head tilted sideways dramatically, large question marks floating around, spiral dizzy effect, completely baffled look, {base_style}, odd angle lighting, clean background, {quality}

determined.name: Ultra Determined
determined.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, ULTRA determined fierce expression, intensely burning {eye_color} eyes with fire reflection effect, extremely furrowed serious brow, gritted teeth showing resolve, veins of determination, dramatic wind effect on face, never give up attitude, glowing aura of willpower, {base_style}, dramatic intense backlighting, clean background, {quality}
determined.game_usage: Boss battles, final challenges, never give up moments

proud.name: Very Proud
proud.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY proud accomplished expression, closed satisfied {eye_color} eyes with superior smile, nose pointed up haughtily, smug grin of achievement, sparkle shine effect on body, puffed up chest proud posture, golden glow aura of accomplishment, over-the-top self-satisfaction, {base_style}, golden triumphant lighting, clean background, {quality}
proud.game_usage: Achievement unlocked, personal best, showing off

embarrassed.name: Very Embarrassed
embarrassed.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY embarrassed flustered expression, {eye_color} eyes looking away shyly, extremely red blushing cheeks glowing bright red, nervous awkward smile, sweat drops from embarrassment, steam coming from red face, hand covering face partially, over-the-top bashful reaction, {base_style}, warm embarrassed red tint lighting, clean background, {quality}
embarrassed.game_usage: Mistakes made, caught in awkward moment

scared.name: Very Scared
scared.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY scared terrified expression, hugely wide trembling {eye_color} eyes with tiny pupils, chattering teeth, face turned pale blue with fear, hair standing on end effect, hiding behind hands peeking through fingers, ghost symbols floating around, over-the-top cartoon terror, {base_style}, spooky blue fear lighting, clean background, {quality}

mischievous.name: Very Mischievous
mischievous.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY mischievous playful expression, narrowed cunning {eye_color} eyes with sparkle of trouble, sly sneaky grin showing playful intent, one eyebrow raised deviously, tongue sticking out slightly, plotting pose with fingertips together, swirl mischief aura, over-the-top prankster look, {base_style}, playful dynamic lighting, clean background, {quality}

lovestruck.name: Love Struck
lovestruck.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY lovestruck adoring expression, huge heart-shaped {eye_color} eyes with hearts as pupils, deeply blushing cheeks, dreamy dazed smile, floating hearts all around, pink love aura glow, completely smitten look, over-the-top cartoon love reaction, {base_style}, soft romantic pink lighting, clean background, {quality}

sleepy.name: Very Sleepy
sleepy.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY sleepy tired expression, half-closed droopy {eye_color} eyes barely staying open, huge yawning mouth wide open, heavy drooping eyelids, multiple Z letters floating around head, nodding off head tilt, drool drop from mouth, over-the-top exhausted drowsy look, {base_style}, dim drowsy warm lighting, clean background, {quality}
sleepy.game_usage: Night time, rest needed, long journey

thinking.name: Deep Thinking
thinking.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY thoughtful pondering expression, {eye_color} eyes looking upward in thought, one hand on chin classic thinking pose, furrowed contemplating brow, thought bubble floating above head, lightbulb appearing nearby, intense intellectual concentration, over-the-top philosopher look, {base_style}, soft intellectual lighting, clean background, {quality}

disgusted.name: Very Disgusted
disgusted.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY disgusted grossed out expression, scrunched up face, {eye_color} eyes squinting in disgust, nose wrinkled strongly, tongue sticking out in yuck reaction, turning face away, green sick tint on face, stink lines visible nearby, over-the-top cartoon revulsion, {base_style}, sickly green tint lighting, clean background, {quality}
disgusted.game_usage: Encountering gross things, bad smell, yucky situations

crying.name: Crying Hard
crying.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY crying sobbing expression, tightly squeezed shut {eye_color} eyes, massive tears streaming down like waterfalls, wide open crying mouth wailing, runny nose, tear puddle forming below, over-the-top dramatic cartoon crying, waterfall of tears effect, {base_style}, blue sad dramatic lighting, clean background, {quality}
crying.game_usage: Very sad moments, touching scenes, dramatic loss

laughing.name: Laughing Hard
laughing.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY laughing hysterical expression, {eye_color} eyes squeezed shut from laughter, wide open mouth laughing loudly with visible tongue, tears of joy streaming, holding stomach from laughing too hard, red flushed cheeks, HA HA text effects around, over-the-top cartoon hilarious reaction, {base_style}, bright joyful lighting, clean background, {quality}

nervous.name: Very Nervous
nervous.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up face portrait, robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, EXTREMELY nervous anxious expression, wide shifting {eye_color} eyes looking around nervously, forced awkward smile, visible trembling and shaking, heavy sweating with multiple sweat drops, biting fingernails nervously, knees knocking together effect, over-the-top cartoon jitters, {base_style}, flickering nervous lighting, clean background, {quality}
nervous.game_usage: Before important events, stage fright, high stakes
